net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.component

Class TreeDisplay

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.component.ComponentDisplay
      • net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.component.TableDisplay
        • net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.component.TreeDisplay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable

    public class TreeDisplay
extends TableDisplay
    Specifies display properties for a Tree.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)

      • getCollapseButton

        public ButtonDisplay getCollapseButton()

      • getExpandButton

        public ButtonDisplay getExpandButton()
        Get the ButtonDisplay describing the button to use for expanding a node.
        Returns:
        ButtonDisplay.

      • isShowRoot

        public boolean isShowRoot()
        Determine if the root node should be shown.
        Returns:
        true to show the root node.

      • setCollapseButton

        public void setCollapseButton(ButtonDisplay collapseButton)
        Set the ButtonDisplay to collapse the node. The given ButtonDisplay will be shown when a node is expanded.
        Parameters:
        collapseButton - ButtonDisplay to collapse the node.

      • setExpandButton

        public void setExpandButton(ButtonDisplay expandButton)
        Set the ButtonDisplay to expand the node. The given ButtonDisplay will be shown when a node is collapsed.
        Parameters:
        expandButton - ButtonDisplay to expand the node.

      • setShowRoot

        public void setShowRoot(boolean showRoot)
        Set whether the root node is shown.
        Parameters:
        showRoot - true to show the root node.
